-- Hoogle documentation, generated by Haddock
-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | Convert camelCase to snake_case and vice versa
--   
@package animalcase
@version 0.1.0.2


-- | This Module converts between camelCase and snake_case.
--   
--   The suffixes specify the base type the functions are working on. L
--   uses lazy <a>Text</a>, S uses <a>String</a> and B8 uses
--   <a>ByteString</a>.
--   
--   Beware, that you should not use <a>ByteString</a>s for serious work,
--   as they only work with 8 bit characters. Do only use when you are
--   absolutely sure, there is no wide character in the string!
module Text.AnimalCase
toCamelCase :: Text -> Text
toSnakeCase :: Text -> Text
toCamelCaseS :: String -> String
toSnakeCaseS :: String -> String
toCamelCaseL :: Text -> Text
toSnakeCaseL :: Text -> Text
toCamelCaseB8 :: ByteString -> ByteString
toSnakeCaseB8 :: ByteString -> ByteString
